Package org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.batch.message

Class MessageCorrelationBatchJobHandler

java.lang.Object
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.batch.AbstractBatchJobHandler<MessageCorrelationBatchConfiguration>
org.cibseven.bpm.engine.impl.batch.message.MessageCorrelationBatchJobHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
BatchJobHandler<MessageCorrelationBatchConfiguration>, OptimisticLockingListener, JobHandler<BatchJobConfiguration>
public class MessageCorrelationBatchJobHandler extends AbstractBatchJobHandler<MessageCorrelationBatchConfiguration>
Job handler for message correlation jobs. The jobs correlate a message to a list of process instances.
